src:
Kerjasama Lintas Kementerian, Menristek Siapkan Dukungan Start-up Baru
04 Nov 2019, 18:08 by Rayinda Muhammad Ichwan


Kerjasama Lintas Kementerian, Menristek Siapkan Dukungan Start-up Baru

KBRN, Jakarta: Kemenristek menyatakan siap mendukung pembangunan ekosistem digital di Indonesia yang berkelanjutan dengan melahirkan berbagai perusahaan digital rintisan (start up).
Menristek Bambang Brodjonegoro mengatakan, melahirkan start up-start up baru di tanah air merupakan salah satu tugas kementeriannya saat ini.
Tak hanya melahirkan, namun dirinya memastikan seluruh start up baru tersebut juga bakal dilakukan pembinaan dengan baik.
"Kami melahirkan dan membina, Kemenkominfo akan menjadi pihak regulator dan penyedia infrastruktur,” katanya, Jakarta, Senin (4/10/2019).
Ia menambahkan, urusan start up tak bisa dikerjakan sebdiri oleh kementeriannya melainkan juga memerlukan bantuan dari lembaga dan kementerian terkait.
”Nanti ada pembagian tugasnya. Kemenkominfo dan Kemenparekraf juga ikut di dalam pembinaannya,” ucapnya.
text:
Cross-Ministry Cooperation, Menristek Prepares for New Start-up Support
Nov 04 2019, 18:08 by Rayinda Muhammad Ichwan


Cross-Ministry Cooperation, Menristek Prepares for New Start-up Support

KBRN, Jakarta: The Ministry of Research and Technology stated that it is ready to support the development of a sustainable digital ecosystem in Indonesia by giving birth to various start-up digital companies.
Minister of Research and Technology Bambang Brodjonegoro said, giving birth to new start-up start-ups in the country is one of the tasks of his ministry at this time.
Not only giving birth, but he made sure all the new start-ups will also be done well coaching.
"We give birth and foster, the Ministry of Communication and Information will become the regulator and infrastructure provider," he said, Jakarta, Monday (10/10/2019).
He added, start-up matters could not be carried out solely by his ministry but also needed help from relevant agencies and ministries.
"Later there will be a division of tasks. The Ministry of Communication and Information and Kemenparekraf also participated in the formation, "he said.
